CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, page 14, reads: "Brushton U. L.'S Santa Fete - The whirl of local holiday celebrations includes the Yule party, sponsored by the Homewood-Brushton unit of the Urban League, at the home of Mrs. Edith Sandidge. Guests are, left to right, seated: Mmes. Louise Meachem, Nellie Briggs, Martha Hudson, Eunity Howard, president: Cora Williams, Elizabeth Webb, Sallie Pendelton and Lillian D. Washington. Standing: Mmes. Mattie Enty, Marjorie Jones, Florence Hatch, Mary Womack, Louise Mitchell, Tempie Aaron, Ella Wiley, Sammie Reese, Edith Sandidge, hostess; Eula Mitchell, Marguerite Pamella, Lillie Jackson, Daisy Boswell, Charlotte Raiford, and Carrie White. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of women, seated from left: Louise Meachem, Nellie Briggs, Martha Hudson, Eunity Howard, Cora Williams, Elizabeth Webb, Sallie Pendelton, and Lillian D. Washington; standing: Mattie Enty, Marjorie Jones, Florence Hatch, Mary Womack, Louise Mitchell, Tempie Aaron, Ella Wiley, Sammie Reese, Eula Mitchell, Marguerite Pamella, Lillie Jackson, Daisy Boswell, Charlotte Raiford, and Carrie White, gathered  for Urban League Christmas party
